name: Retro Vision
description: Retro Vision is an interactive music experience. Rotate around a track and avoid obstacles in your way while the world around you reacts to music. Featuring a completely customisable layout and a two button control scheme, it's easy to pick up but hard to put down.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2300/AMD FX-4100 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDEA GeForce 510 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 6450 2GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
